product_name: White Sierra Cozy Fleece Jacket - Women's Extended Sizes - Special Buy
long_description: Ideal for any adventure, the White Sierra Cozy fleece jacket in extended sizes is lightweight, warm and soft against skin. Breathable, quick-drying and non-pilling polyester fleece offers warmth without a lot of weight, so you stay comfortable. White Sierra Cozy fleece jacket features handwarmer pockets and a drawcord hem. Special buy.
